selectWorld.backupWarning.experimental: Minecraft has detected an unknown presence in this world. It is advised that you DO NOT PASS THIS SCREEN. Ignoring this warning may result in strange occurrences and/or encounters. Remember, don't stare directly at the bugs.
selectWorld.warning.experimental.title: Unknown Entity Error
selectWorld.warning.experimental.questio: Minecraft has detected an unknown presence in this world. It is advised that you DO NOT PASS THIS SCREEN. Ignoring this warning may result in strange occurrences and/or encounters. Remember, don't stare directly at the bugs.
config.page1.title: Page 1
config.page2.title: Page 2
config.page3.title: Page 3
config.page4.title: Page 4
config.page5.title: Page 5
config.page6.title: Page 6
config.sss.title: Super Secret Settings
config.pages.title: Pages
config.sightingChanceConfig.title: Sighting Chance
config.sightingChanceConfig.description: Adjusts the chance of Herobrine appearing.
config.dayDelayConfig.title: Haunting Delay
config.dayDelayConfig.description: Changes the delay for how long it takes for Herobrine to start major haunting (in-game days).
config.ghostDoorConfig.title: Ghost Doors
config.ghostDoorConfig.description: Changes whether or not Herobrine can open your doors.
config.ghostMineConfig.title: Ghost Miner
config.ghostMineConfig.description: Changes whether or not Herobrine will mine next to you in strip mines.
config.creepingConfig.title: Creeping Mechanic
config.creepingConfig.description: Changes whether or not Herobrine will stand behind you waiting for you to turn around.
config.stalkingConfig.title: Stalking Mechanic
config.stalkingConfig.description: Changes whether or not Herobrine will stalk you from a distance.
config.poofingTorchesConfig.title: Disappearing Torches
config.poofingTorchesConfig.description: Changes whether or not Herobrine will try to break your torches once you leave the area (one check per in-game day).
config.burningBaseConfig.title: Burning Base
config.burningBaseConfig.description: Changes whether or not Herobrine will try to burn down your house once you leave the area (one check per in-game day).
config.spotNoiseConfig.title: Sighting Noise
config.spotNoiseConfig.description: Changes whether or not a noise is played when the player spots Herobrine.
config.glowingEyesConfig.title: Emissive Layers
config.glowingEyesConfig.description: Changes whether or not Herobrine will have emissive layers. Useful for players who want to make him more vanilla, or that use dynamic lighting.
config.herobrineSkinConfig.title: Herobrine Skin
config.lurkingLanguageConfig.title: Lurking Language
config.lurkingLanguageConfig.description: Changes the language that Herobrine will use to communicate with the player.
config.jumpscareConfig.title: Jumpscare Mechanic
config.jumpscareConfig.description: Enables the ability for Herobrine to jumpscare the player when they get too close.
config.crashConfig.title: Crash Mechanic
config.crashConfig.description: Swaps the jumpscare mechanic for the og crash mechanic. [EPILEPSY WARNING!] [NOT FIT FOR WEAKER MACHINES!] (Only works when jumpscare is enabled.)
config.creepingVanishingDelayConfig.desc: Changes how long it takes for Herobrine to disappear after being caught creeping up on the player.
config.stalkingVanishingDelayConfig.desc: Changes how long it takes for Herobrine to disappear after being caught stalking the player.
config.noSleepConfig.title: No Sleep
config.noSleepConfig.description: Toggles whether or not Herobrine will prevent you from sleeping when he's nearby. (Will not work on peaceful.)
config.dreadfulDonationConfig.title: Dreadful Donation
config.dreadfulDonationConfig.descriptio: Toggles whether or not Herobrine will leave you gifts in your chests. (Can happen before the 3 days pass or a shrine is built. One check per in-game day.)
config.crimsonCurseConfig.title: Crimson Curse
config.crimsonCurseConfig.description: Toggles whether or not Herobrine will change your torches to redstone torches and your lanterns to soul lanterns. (one check per in-game day)
config.OGshrineMechanicConfig.title: OG Shrine Mechanic
config.OGshrineMechanicConfig.descriptio: Toggles whether or not lightning strikes when activating a Herobrine shrine.
config.nightmareMechanicConfig.title: Nightmare Mechanic
config.nightmareMechanicConfig.descripti: Toggles whether or not Herobrine will appear at the foot of your bed when you sleep.
config.windowWatcherConfig.title: Window Watcher
config.windowWatcherConfig.description: Toggles whether or not Herobrine will disappear when viewed through a window.
config.chilledCandlesConfig.title: Chilled Candles
config.chilledCandlesConfig.description: Toggles whether or not Herobrine has the ability to snuff out the players candles.
config.sinisterSignsConfig.title: Sinister Signs
config.sinisterSignsConfig.description: Toggles whether or not Herobrine will leave signs for the player during certain events.
config.sightingSenseConfig.title: Sighting Sense
config.sightingSenseConfig.description: Changes whether or not your pets will react when Herobrine is nearby.
config.nameTagConfig.title: Nametag
config.nameTagConfig.description: Changes whether or not Herobrine has a nametag and how it appears.
config.rekindlingShrineConfig.title: Rekindling Shrine
config.rekindlingShrineConfig.descriptio: Changes whether or not Herobrine will relight doused shrines.
config.advancementsConfig.title: Advancements
config.advancementsConfig.description: Changes whether players will be rewarded advancements related to From The Fog. (ADVANCEMENTS GRANTED WHILE ENABLED WILL BE LOST IF DISABLED!!!)
config.fearfulFootstepsConfig.title: Fearful Footsteps
config.fearfulFootstepsConfig.descriptio: Changes whether or not Herobrine will run up behind players creating footsteps.
config.shrineSupriseConfig.title: Shrine Surprise
config.shrineSupriseConfig.description: Changes whether or not Herobrine will appear on top of the shrine when lit.
config.lurkingConfig.title: Lurking Mechanic
config.lurkingConfig.description: Changes whether or not Herobrine will lurk around the player watching from a very far distance.
config.autoConfigDisable.title: Take Back Control
config.autoConfigEnable.title: Give It Control
config.autoConfig.description: Changes whether or not Herobrine can modify the config.
config.hittingThatGriddyConfig.title: Hitting That Griddy
config.hittingThatGriddyConfig.descripti: Changes whether or not Herobrine will spawn doing the griddy.
config.hoeBrineReturnsConfig.title: Hoebrine Returns
config.hoeBrineReturnsConfig.description: Changes Herobrine back to Hoebrine as a reference to the original bug that would occur when the player would see Herobrine without the resourcepack enabled.

sign.type4.line3: THIS IS THE PLAYERS USERNAME, CHANGING THIS HAS NO EFFECT.
advancements.ftf.root.title: From The Fog
advancements.ftf.root.description: You can't see him, but I promise he can see you...
advancements.ftf.built_shrine.title: You Don't Know What You Did...
advancements.ftf.jumpscared.title: Behind You...
advancements.ftf.jumpscared.description: Get jumpscared by Herobrine for the first time.
advancements.ftf.found_herobrine_structu: Discover any structure placed by Herobrine.
advancements.ftf.herobrine_griddy.title: WHAT?!
advancements.ftf.be_the_librarian.title: A Light In The Dark...
advancements.ftf.liberty_lantern.title: Hello Liberty.
advancements.ftf.liberty_lantern.descrip: Give a lantern to an Allay.
advancements.ftf.dog_growl.title: You Okay Boy?
advancements.ftf.dog_growl.description: Witness a tamed wolf growl at Herobrine.
advancements.ftf.have_a_nightmare.title: Just A Bad Dream... Right?
advancements.ftf.have_a_nightmare.descri: Have a nightmare for the first time.
advancements.ftf.found_logless_tree.desc: Discover a tree that you didn't chop down.
advancements.ftf.named_dd_item.title: It's Communicating...
advancements.ftf.spotted_herobrine.title: I Should Call Kevin!
advancements.ftf.spotted_herobrine.descr: Spot Herobrine for the first time.
advancements.ftf.be_comical_bonzo.title: Literally Awesome.
advancements.ftf.ghost_miner.title: WHAT WAS THAT?
advancements.ftf.ghost_miner.description: Encounter Herobrine digging around you while you're mining.
advancements.ftf.take_gm_torch.title: I'm Gonna Take It, Screw you!
advancements.ftf.take_gm_torch.descripti: Take the torch from the ghost miner.
advancements.ftf.dreadful_donation.title: Who Put This Here?
advancements.ftf.dreadful_donation.descr: Find a Dreadful Donation from Herobrine.
Get stalked by Herobrine without noticing.
advancements.ftf.survive_3_days.title: Is Someone Following Me?
advancements.ftf.survive_10_days.title: Someone's Following Me...
advancements.ftf.survive_50_days.title: Leave Me Alone.
advancements.ftf.survive_100_days.title: I Have To Hide.
advancements.ftf.survive_200_days.title: Get Me Out of Here!
advancements.ftf.found_torch_tunnel.titl: I Am Not Going Down That.
advancements.ftf.found_torch_tunnel.desc: Discover a tunnel dug by Herobrine.
chat.cleanup.failure.description: There are currently no Herobrines loaded in this world!
This command activates the creeping mechanic and spawns Herobrine behind the player it is executed on.
This command activates the stalking mechanic and spawns Herobrine somewhere around the player it is executed on. Herobrine may not spawn if his spawnpoint is determined to be in the line of sight another player.
chat.sighting_summons.nightmare.tutorial: This command activates the nightmare mechanic and spawns Herobrine at the foot of the bed of the player it is executed on. Herobrine will not spawn if the player isn't in a bed.
chat.sighting_summons.lurking.tutorial.d: This command activates the lurking mechanic and spawns Herobrine somewhere off in the distance around the player it is executed on. Herobrine may not spawn if his spawnpoint is determined to be within 40 blocks of a player.
